findings.title: Minting of unlimited number of sundae tokens
Unprotected mint function in MGB token contract
findings.description: The mint function in the MGB token contract is unprotected and can be exploited.

findings.title: Unprotected setSaleRound function in SaleRound contract
findings.description: The setSaleRound function in the SaleRound contract is unprotected, which can lead to unauthorized access and potential security risks.

findings.title: Unprotected setPrivateSale function in PrivateSale contract
findings.description: The setPrivateSale function in the PrivateSale contract is unprotected and can be exploited.
